data.title: Boys & Girls Clubs of Toledo
data.text:
The Boys & Girls Clubs of Toledo Alumni Hall of Fame was established in 1992 during the Clubs’ Centennial year. Its purpose is to recognize former Toledo Newsboys Association, Boys Club and Boys & Girls Club members and staff who have distinguished themselves in their personal and professional lives. Their stories are very different, but they all began with the life–changing programs, caring adult staff, and fun, safe environment provided at the Boys & Girls Clubs of Toledo. These individuals are role models and are an inspiration to us all.

1992 Centennial Year

Common Pleas Judge & BGCT Trustee Judge Charles Doneghy (deceased)

Sky Financial Group Chairman & former Club trustee Edward J. Reiter

Attorney & BGCT Trustee Harry Fink (deceased)

Former TPS Board President & Fifth/Third Bank Larry Sykes

Oldest Living Newsboy Phil Zimmerman (deceased)

1993

BGCT former Executive Director (1971-89) Ed Johansen (deceased)

McDonald’s Corp. Regional Manager Chris Wicks

1994

Former restaurateur and TPS teacher Ted Arvanitis

1995

Toledo Fire Chief, State Fire Marshall, City of Toledo Mayor & BGCT Trustee Michael Bell*

Businessman Lester Haddad (deceased)

1996

Former local broadcaster & Minister Bill Harris

1997

Founder/owner of AVCA Corp. & BGCT Trustee William Christophers

1998

Attorney & BGCT Trustee James Jeffery

1999

BGCT Member / Executive Director David Wehrmeister

2000

Libbey High School Basketball Coach Leroy Bates

2001

Macomber High School, Ohio State University, NBA player, business owner Jim Jackson

2002

Daimler Chrysler employee; BGCT volunteer Terry Stern

US Army & BGCT Trustee John Reynolds

2003

School Administrator – TPS & BGCT Trustee Richard Jackson

2004

Former Camp employee – BGCT Life Trustee Justice G. Johnson, Jr.

Former BGCT staff member; TPS Board Member; Attorney-City of Toledo, BGCT Trustee, Lucas County Auditor - Anita Lopez

Actor - Jamie Farr*

2005

BGCT staff member (1967- ), TPS Teacher - Stan Lewandowski

2006

Former BGCT member, ProMedica VP / BGCT Trustee - Mike Wilkins

BGCT staff member / B&GCA MW Regional VP – John Miller

2008

Fifth Third Bank Regional CEO & President – Bob LaClair

2009

Former BGCT Member, Renhill Staffing Services CEO – Joe Braden

2010

2011

Former BGCT Executive Director (1989-2000) and BGCA National Staff (upon his retirement from BGCT) – Ken Rubin

Former BGCT member, and CSB staff member – John Hollingsworth

2014

Former BGCT staff member – Robert Yenrick

2015

2018

Former BGCT member / TPS Superintendent – Dr. Romules Durant

2019

*Inducted in the Boys & Girls Clubs of America Alumni Hall of Fame
